results.content: There could be subtitles to this course because it might get hard for many people to catch up on the dictation. As well as, the videos that are for longer minutes like 49 mins, 47 mins, or more than one hour, should be broken into parts. Usually, a human being can keep their focus up to 45 mins average.  For a beginner, this could be a bit overwhelming. All in all, for someone who knows, react, for me, it was a good course. It was just enough to understand how to React and PHP sync together to work together. It also helped me learn how to make a corona tracker, which I was wanting to create for some time. The bonus part is great, you get to learn to deploy to google cloud platform! Thank you for this course!

response.content: Thanks for the comment ! I was working on the subtitles actually, but were affected by ongoing work, will definitely put my focus back to this course once my work is over.

results.content: It was perfect and best part of this course is that it covers most of issue that a first time React JS developer would face. Very detailed and I'm able to learn how to build an application within 24 hours. Highly recommend!

response.content: Thanks Brandon ! Hope you enjoy it, and you could reach me if you ever faced any difficulty in implementing ReactJS !
